titles.title: A resolution on health care for Members of Congress and for the American people.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5844-5845)
Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 5/17/1994--Introduced. Urges the Congress to enact health care reform that guarantees everyone health care as good as the best health care that will be available to Members of Congress.
